mng: to climb (by pulling oneself up), to implicate, to claim connections of higher status

exm.mng: to climb, to pull oneself up, to clamber, to scale, fig. to forge ahead in the face of hardships and danger
to make invidious comparisons, to compete with, to emulate
rock climbing, to climb a rockface
Panzhihua prefecture-level city in the south of Sichuan
too high to reach (idiom); eminent and unapproachable
Panzhihua prefecture level city in south Sichuan, bordering Yunnan, famous for steel production and pollution
social climbing, to claim connections with people in higher social class
